alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 9:41PM CDT until July 16 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clay County in south central Nebraska... Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... Webster County in south central Nebraska... Eastern Adams County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 940 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Harvard to near Deweese to near Blue Hill, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Fairfield, Lawrence, Deweese and Rosemont around 945 PM CDT. Red Cloud and Cowles around 950 PM CDT. Nelson and Guide Rock around 1000 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Edgar, Nora, Bostwick, Superior, Ruskin, Ong, Davenport, Hardy and Oak. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
